results.title: Insights into Silica-Induced Lung Fibrosis: Fibrotic Gene Signatures, Pathways, and Therapeutic Opportunities.
results.text_hl: In vivo validation in a @CHEMICAL_Silicon_Dioxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012822 @@@silica@@@-induced @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ model further demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment significantly reduced the expression of key @<m>DISEASE_Odontoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009810 @@@fibro@@@-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ genes and attenuated the increase in fibrotic markers in lung tissue.

citations.NLM: Alsohime F, Saheb Sharif-Askari N, Alharbi NS, Alosaimi MFA, Halwani R. Insights into Silica-Induced Lung Fibrosis: Fibrotic Gene Signatures, Pathways, and Therapeutic Opportunities. Int Arch Allergy Immunol. 2025 Sep 4;():1-20. PMID: 40906593
